event_title: The Paragon of Not Worrying About Stuff

interactivity.requirements: 50 Rin Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " All is Bright. All is Beautiful. "

progression.synopsis: Rin wants to remind Sensei that she has a girlfriend now. Haruka would rather that she got back to work, and talks to Sensei while Rin does so. They are interrupted when Rin freezes and drops a cup. Rin claims that it was nothing, but Haruka suggests that she take a break and talk to Sensei for a while. Rin spends the whole time talking about Otoha â€” she seems very confident about the future, but Sensei thinks that something feels off.
trivia: There is some minor variation based on Sensei's relationship with Haruka.

event_references.event_default_name: The Paragon of Not Worrying About Stuff

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.20p1.
